verses.roman:
dvārakāṁ sa samabhyetya
pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ
apaśyad ādyaṁ puruṣam
āsīnaṁ kāñcanāsane

synonyms: dvārakām—at Dvārakā; saḥ—he (the brāhmaṇa); samabhyetya—arriving; pratīhāraiḥ—by the gatekeepers; praveśitaḥ—brought inside; apaśyat—he saw; ādyam—the original; puruṣam—Supreme Person; āsīnam—seated; kāñcana—golden; āsane—on a throne.
translation: Upon reaching Dvārakā, the brāhmaṇa was brought inside by the gatekeepers and saw the primeval Personality of Godhead sitting on a golden throne.
